entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 5:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 this evening then becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
